name: Eight Ball
description: Bally's pool-themed trilogy spanning 1977–1985, designed by George Christian. Eight Ball Deluxe became one of the best-selling pinball machines ever made.

name: Black Knight
description: Williams' medieval-themed series spanning 1980–1989, revived by Stern in 2019. The original Black Knight introduced multi-level playfields and speech to pinball.

name: High Speed
description: Williams' street-racing series. High Speed (1986) pioneered the use of a narrative story in pinball; The Getaway: High Speed II (1992) added a multiball frenzy.

name: Pinbot
description: Williams' robot-themed series. Pinbot (1986) was a landmark solid-state design; Bride of Pinbot (1991) continued the storyline.
